toggleEmoteBar.name: Toggle Emote Bar
toggleEmoteBar.hint: Press this key to open/close the emote bar

warning.pleaseSelectOneToken: Please select at least one token.
warning.noPermission: You do not have permission to use the emote tool on the selected token(s).
warning.selectMultiple: Hold Shift to select multiple emotes IF YOU DARE.
warning.selectSingle: Please select a single token to set offsets.
warning.noAsecSmoking: You must have the Animated Spell Effects Cartoon module for the smoke effect.
